alert.note: Alert for Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 28 at 3:59AM MST until November 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect for portions of the area Today from 11 AM through 5 PM... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 227... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 227. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
